text: Chop the onion, garlic cloves, and ginger. Chop  the tomato and also the chillies but make sure that no seeds are present. Chop all the coriander leaves and the capsicum into small parts. Pour 4 eggs and 1 cup of milk in a bowl. Add salt according to your taste. Rinse thoroughly so that the mixture is properly mixed. Take a frying pan and add 2 tablespoon (29.6 ml) of vegetable oil in it. Heat the oil in low flame. Add onions to the pan and fry till it's golden yellow. Then add the chopped garlic and ginger and fry till 1 minute. Add some of the chopped tomato and coriander leaves and also the chopped capsicum. (Note: Keep some tomatoes and coriander for a finishing touch.) Add the egg mixture into the pan and stir it so that no lumps are formed. Make sure you have a low flame, or else it will stick it to your pan. Stir continuously till a creamy mixture is formed. And now add the rest of the tomatoes and coriander and mix it thoroughly and cook another  1 minute. Now you're are done with mixture (scrambled creamy egg). Apply a layer of butter on each of the bread slices. Sandwich the Akoori in between the 2 slices. For an extra taste add a bit of sauce and pepper. Now you are ready to serve your Persian cuisine. Enjoy.
